General.Name: Comstock Mining Inc
General.Description: Comstock Inc. engages in the systemic decarbonization business in Nevada and internationally. The company operates through five segments: Fuels, Metals, Mining, Strategic Investments, and Corporate Services. It develops and commercializes technology that extract and convert wasted and unused lignocellulosic biomass into intermediates for refining into advanced renewable fuels. The company also owns 100% in the Lucerne Project located in the Storey County, Nevada; and the Spring Valley Project situated in the Lyon County, Nevada. In addition, it offers engineering and construction services; and invests in non-mining real estate, water rights, and securities investments. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Virginia City, Nevada.
General.Address: 117 American Flat Road, Virginia City, NV, United States, 89440
